title: RTA, Metra to Hold Joint 2016 Budget Hearings (RTA - Regional Transportation Authority)
text: ( Source : RTA - Regional Transportation Authority ) The Regional Transportation Authority (RTA) and Metra will hold eight joint public hearings to gather customer input on their proposed 2016 budgets. In addition, the RTA will hold an
